biotools.summary: DENDRO (Dna based EvolutioNary tree preDiction by scRna-seq technOlogy) is an R package, which takes scRNA-seq data for a tumor (or related somatic tissues) and accurately reconstructs its phylogeny, assigning each single cell from the single cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data to a subclone.

bioschemas.name: DENDRO
